bsputils_app.h File Reference
Sample Example API » Sample Example - Utility library API » Application helper APIs

Header file to use application level helper functions. More...

#include <ti/drv/vps/include/common/trace.h>

Macros

#define BSPUTILS_APP_TST_STATUS_PASS   (0x50415353U)
 Magic String for App Test Status : PASS.
 
#define BSPUTILS_APP_TST_STATUS_FAIL   (0x46417376U)
 Magic String for App Test Status : FAIL.
 
#define BSPUTILS_APP_TST_STATUS_INIT   (0x494E4954U)
 Magic String for App Test Status : Started.
 
#define BSPUTILS_APP_TST_STATUS_AINF   (0x41494E46U)
 Magic String for App Test Status : AppImage not found.
 
#define BSPUTILS_APP_TST_ADDR   (0x4033B100U)
 OCMC Address used to store App Test Status.

void BspUtils_appServiceWatchdog (void)
 Services the watchdog timer set by SBL. For TDA2x/TDA2Ex wd timer 2 is refreshed. For TDA3xx RTI instance 4 is refreshed if enabled.
